Perfection...
When there is nothing left to take away.
- Antoine de Saint-Exupery

Work

I've been into minimalism since before "flat" was a buzzword; it reflects my design style: bold and direct, but underwhelming.

Unless you live in a rural town, you're already overwhelmed by the unsolicited advertising you see on billboards, in magazines and, now even, in videos at gas station pumps and ads in your restaurant menus.

I want you to come to my site, get past the fluff and decoration, find the information you're looking for - that's what's going to get you to contact me. It's the same thing I want for your visitors. If you get it, well then, contact me.

A Bit About Me

I am a designer & client-side developer. I spend most of my time writing HTML/5, CSS/3 and JavaScript to integrate new and existing sites with Joomla CMS using a content-first, responsive design approach.

Currently, I'm working on a pet project named Habbla, that I hope will benefit the web community.
